item.title: North African Eggs
item.description: Serves: 2 Ingredients Olive oil, for frying 1 onion, peeled and diced 1 red pepper, deseeded and diced 1 green pepper, deseeded and diced 2 garlic cloves, peeled and sliced 1 red chilli, deseeded and chopped 1 tsp cumin seeds 5 ripe tomatoes, roughly chopped (add a pinch of sugar if the tomatoes arenâ€™t quite ripe) 4 eggs Sea salt and freshly ground black pepper To serve 1 tbsp chopped coriander leaves 1 spring onion, trimmed and finely chopped Crusty bread Method
